item.description:
Hello!

Please join me for this year's FREE annual presentation of The Shakespeare play Coriolanus by the Commonwealth Shakespeare Company this Friday at 7 p.m. on the Boston Commons.

More info here:
http://www.commshakes.org/

Let me know which goodies you might want to bring for a potluck picnic: sandwiches, pasta and potato salads, sliced fruit, watermelon, chips, snacks, veggies, desserts and what have you! Let's continue this wonderful Boston Poetry Union tradition!

I hope to see you all soon,

Emilie
item.how_to_find_us: Now on FRIDAY! Boston Commons Near The Big Scaffolding and all the people with chairs and picnic blankets
item.name: Free Presentation of Coriolanus and Picnic on The Boston Commons!
